byline.contributor: David Callender reported from Madison, and Julie Bosman from Chicago.
byline.original: By DAVID CALLENDER and JULIE BOSMAN

abstract: At least six women have accused University of Wisconsin senior Alec Cook of sexual assault; revelations have shaken campus while also revealing continued reticence of some women to file complaints of sexual assault, even as campuses across nation openly confront problem; prosecutors have formally charged Cook, calling him serial sexual predator who targeted fellow college students on Madison campus.
lead_paragraph: The student, Alec Cook, 20, was charged with 14 felonies and one misdemeanor. “Dozens” have contacted the authorities, all “wanting to speak” about Mr. Cook.
snippet: The student, Alec Cook, 20, was charged with 14 felonies and one misdemeanor. “Dozens” have contacted the authorities, all “wanting to speak” about Mr. Cook....

headline.main: At Least 6 Women Accuse University of Wisconsin Student of Assault
headline.print_headline: At Least Six Women Accuse Wisconsin Student of Assault
